item.title: By: Bobble

item.description: You can also click start and type in "notepad" in the search box, then press ctl-shift-enter. This opens an instance of notepad as administrator. You can also do this for command prompt (cmd) or any other tool...very handy.
item.content:encoded: You can also click start and type in “notepad” in the search box, then press ctl-shift-enter. This opens an instance of notepad as administrator. You can also do this for command prompt (cmd) or any other tool…very handy.
